name: All Scanners in One: Detector Pack
name_original: All Scanners in One: Detector Pack
description:
*** THE TOP SELLING SCANNER/METER APP IS ON SALE FOR A VERY LIMITED AMOUNT OF TIME. Get ALL your scanner and meter needs with this all-in-one app, and enjoy what MILLIONS have at a fraction of the cost. ***

This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true finger scanning functionality.

All Scanners in One detects all things you need and more! Just hold your finger down on the scanner, have it analyze your DNA, and it tells you any of the following you choose:

*Are You a Catch?

*How Se(x)y Are You?

*The Mood Scanner.

*Femininity Scanner. (Are you a Male or Female?)

*Loser Detector.

*Stupidity Scanner.

*How Gross Are You?

*Ugly Scanner 2000.

*Random Button to take you to any Scanner.

Have it all in the palm of your hands, and reduce all the clutter of icons in your iPhone screen to one.

***SECRET FEATURE***
You can cheat to FORCE the needle to have a left most reading or a right most reading. Press the LEFT or RIGHT side of the red label of the Scanner Name (just below the finger scanner) to force a left or right needle reading. Pushing down on either of these secret buttons will cause the small light under the needle to blink.


Tip: If you pressed one of the secret buttons and would like to return to normal operation without performing a scan, put your finger on the scanner, and remove your finger before the scan is complete. The last secret button you pressed will then be canceled and resume to normal operation.
